actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide authorizations for appropriations for Federal Trade Commission for the fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.

summary.text: Provides that the amounts appropriated to carry out the functions, powers, and duties of the Federal Trade Commission shall not exceed 33,000,000 for the fiscal year 1974, 36,300,000 for the fiscal year 1975, and 39,930,000 for the fiscal year 1976. States that for the fiscal years ending after June 30, 1976, there may be appropriated such sums as the Congress may hereafter authorize by law.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide authorizations for appropriations for Federal Trade Commission for the fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.
